msbt.message: I guess it's good that we haven't developed every single inch of the island yet, eh? After all, sometimes you wanna take a selfie with a natural background.
This would be a really good spot for me to put on a concert! I've been wanting to do that for so long, do you think I could become a guitar virtuoso by next week?
You think I could draw a crowd to this lonely spot doing nothing else besides my signature dance? Challenge accepted! Here I go!
in is sweeter than in the evening Hey, I could make a song out of that!
Heya! I had a feeling I might run into you if I took a walk around here, Heh. Sometimes I feel like I should open a side business as a private detective.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wondering about this incredibly modern and stylish yet classic home, eh? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, it's my place! The old Casa de ! That's French for "my totally rad house."
Have you ever been to 's house?It's really nice, but it smells so much like that it kind of freaks me out. Like, how much do you have to drink for your whole HOUSE to smell like it?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Still roughing it, eh? Well, you got a good location, that's for sure.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And you know what they say about location? It's EVERYTHING!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This place is cute and compactnot an inch of wasted space.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Must make it easy to break the ice at parties, eh? Ha HA!
Whoa, you're really living large, aren't you, ?What do you do with all the space? I've been looking for a new location for studio
Look at you, ! Living with two whole rooms in that palace of yours. So what's the back room for, anyway? Got a major collection or something?
So you're rockin' a grand total of THREE rooms in your house? That's so cool! With all that space, I could build my own -cave and still have room for !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yo, your house is like a castle, ! Do you get lonely in a place that huge or what? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Because if you do, I'm more than happy to come over and live large with you!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Man, I've always wanted a place like yours with multiple levels<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'd probably just spend all my time going up and down the stairs, though. Ha HA!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow, your palazzo even has a basement. That's so cool, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What do you keep down there, eh? You don't have to tell me, but I'm just gonna start guessing

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Check it out—'s place is still a tent.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I see that and I think about staring up at the stars at nightwaking up to a crisp, cold sunrise Ugh! Sounds terrible!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know, living in a small place like here can have its benefits. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You can get, like, one really awesome piece of designer furnitureand that's all you need! It really helps if you're trying to save a few Bells.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't really see a downside to living in a smaller home like here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If you throw a karaoke party, there's nowhere for folks to go. They HAVE to listen to you sing!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Check it out—'s place has two rooms. Know what I'd do with an extra room? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Probably nothing. I'd make all kinds of wild plans but then just fill it up with my collection.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Check it out—'s place is so big it probably has its own area code!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />And here we have a fabulous mansion that belongs to the fabulous . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ugh, the place is just dripping with class. I hate that I love it so much,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />And here's 's modest castle. Ha HA!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You see what I did there? Because castles are never modest! They're always totally over-the-top!
I heard that just got a basement installed. Niiiiice.You know what you can do in a basement, right?Paint your miniature figurines in peace and quiet!
So what do you think about Timmy's little shop, eh?It's like, he's kind of Tom Nook's competitor and apprentice at the same time. I'd keep an eye on that one. Oh, and Tommy too. I guess.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Timmy and Tommy really are entrepreneurial geniuses.The passion and business acumen with which they run Nook's Cranny is highly impressive. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's just the kind of thing that'll make THE must- shop destination in this hemisphere.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nook's Cranny really adds something to the hip and up-and-coming vibe we've got going on the island. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's got a wide array of products, plus Timmy and Tommy are, like, an entrepreneurial dream team. It's no wonder the shop is on everyone's must-see list.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I know that Blathers's tent isn't, like, a world-class museum yet. I mean, c'mon, it's still a tent! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But I've got my VIP card NOW, so I can be a museum baller when this is the place to be. You just watch.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know who's the real brains behind ? It's clearly Isabelle! <20_2 arg="6" />Can you imagine what this place would be like without her?Ugh, the whole island would be like my place on laundry day.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yep, there's the good old Captain VIP Airport.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Alright, alright, you got me. It's not actually called that. <10_4 />Yet.
Know the best place on the island to get an autograph? Right here. You never know who might show up! And, well, now that we're here What do you want me to sign?
I love what they've done here with this stone. Just think of the potential I am a dancer and this is my canvas!<10_4 /> What do you mean, "Dancers don't use canvas"? I'm a dancer-painter!
Having something tailored, eh? Bravo, .Do you ever talk much with Sable when you're here? She never seems to want to engage with me
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Well, well Looks like we've got a new resident incoming!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Can't wait to meet 'em and give 'em the patented tour of !
I'm no gardener, but that's , no?Wow. I still can't believe how nature works. Do you think I could somehow grow fully cooked ?
If I had to sum up the museum in one word, it would probably be <10_5 />reallycoolandfun. It counts if you say it fast!
Lately I'm obsessed with the hereI just watch it swim, and imagine like me trying to do the same. We'd be awesome at it!
I've spent a lot of time with the here lately Its color and lustre, the compact form factor and sense of balanceHow can I get a pair of shoes that are half as stylish?!
Lately I've been thinking about the exhibit here a lot I'm trying to decide if having your bones on display a million years after your lifetime is good or bad
My hobby du jour is gazing at the over in the museum's new art wing.I can't explain it, but something about that piece really speaks to me.Or rather, to a part of me I didn't even know existed!
